entries.title: New Season Announced
entries.text: Attack on Titan spin-off confirmed for 2026.

entries.title: Streaming Update
entries.text: Demon Slayer Season 4 will stream globally next spring.

entries.title: Manga Milestone
entries.text: One Piece surpasses 500 million copies sold worldwide.

entries.title: Anime Awards
entries.text: Jujutsu Kaisen wins Best Animation at the 2025 Anime Awards.
